Description:
Detects usage of "query.exe" a system binary to exfil information such as "sessions" and "processes" for later use

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Query Usage To Exfil Data
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%:\windows\system32\query.exe' and (command like '%session >%' or command like '%process >%')
